name: Lost Possessions
description:
Have you ever lost things that you seemingly have misplaced and never found them?
Lost Possessions puts you in the perspective of a traveller who came across a very isolated small village who have all lost something in the past day. You're tasked with trying to find them before dusk hits...

Controls
WASD - Movement
E - Pick Up

NOTE: I do not own any of the assets I used & the rights belong to their respective owners. This was created purely for educational purposes.
